meanings.definition: To transfer data from a computer to a central server.
meanings.sent1: I uploaded my photos to the cloud.
meanings.sent2: She uploaded the presentation for everyone to see.
meanings.sent3: The cat uploaded a funny video of itself playing with a toy.
meanings.sent4: His words uploaded a sense of urgency to the situation.
meanings.sent5: The sun uploaded its warmth to the chilly morning.

meanings.definition: To send or post a file or document online.
meanings.sent1: They uploaded the new song on their website.
meanings.sent2: He uploaded the report on the company's portal.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel uploaded a picture of its acorn stash on social media.
meanings.sent4: Her smile uploaded joy to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The storm uploaded its power through thunder and lightning.
